item.title: The preparation of feather brushes used in springbok hunting

summary.i: How the Feather Brushes used in springbok hunting are prepared and smoked. By /han≠kass'o (L VIII.-23. 8073-8075, 8083 1/2 and 8083 1/2 rev.).

item.comments: 1) See also Tactics in springbok hunting, 2) This story is found in Book VIII-23
item.author: |han≠kass'o (Klein Jantje) (VIII)
